backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two inspection‑reset features and the files, components, and test IDs associated with them.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptions used for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark OKLCH color tokens and applying global background/foreground variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the TimerScreen component in a theme provider with dark-mode defaults.
frontend/src/components/EventSelector.ts: Dropdown for selecting WCA events, disabled during solves.
frontend/src/components/ScramblePanel.ts: Card showing the current scramble with a button to request a new one.
frontend/src/components/ScrambleVisualiz: Loads a 2D puzzle visualization via cubing.js CDN and displays it based on event and scramble.
frontend/src/components/SessionStats.tsx: Card displaying session statistics such as current, best, ao5, ao12, and mo3.
frontend/src/components/SolveHistory.tsx: Scrollable grid displaying recent solves with DNF highlighting and formatted times.
frontend/src/components/TimerDisplay.tsx: Main timer UI showing inspection, running, and final result states with color and text cues, plus pointer start controls.
frontend/src/components/TimerScreen.tsx: Main timer screen handling event selection, scramble generation, solve timing, session persistence, and stats display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and methods using Internet Identity, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting that backend queries are unused because scrambles are generated client‑side.
frontend/src/hooks/useWcaScramble.ts: Generates WCA scrambles via cubing.js and manages scramble state and loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useWcaTimerControls.t: Implements full WCA‑style timer logic including inspection, timing, state transitions, and warning sounds.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom color theme for the timer, including light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/inspectionAudio.ts: Implements Web Audio API beeps for 8‑second and 5‑second inspection warnings.
frontend/src/lib/sessionCookie.ts: Saves and loads session data to a cookie, including event, scramble, and solve history.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStats.ts: Computes session statistics such as current time, best, ao5, ao12, and mo3 from solve history.
frontend/src/lib/wcaEvents.ts: Defines the WCAEvent interface and exports a list of supported WCA events with IDs, names, and scramble identifiers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/types/cubing.d.ts: Provides TypeScript type declarations for cubing.net scramble and twisty player modules.
frontend/src/types/solves.ts: Defines solve data types and utility functions for formatting and computing solve times with inspection outcomes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, existing issues, and feature requests related to resetting the inspection timer after solves.
